SELECT d.build_id, d.build_name, d.layer_number, d.room_id, d.is_mixed, d.college_ids, d.manage_teacher_id, t.teacher_name as manage_teacher_name, d.room_type, d.status, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM student_info s WHERE s.build_id = d.build_id AND s.room_id = d.room_id) as current_student_count FROM room_build_details d LEFT JOIN teacher_info t ON d.manage_teacher_id = t.teacher_id INNER JOIN room_build rb ON d.build_id = rb.build_id
rb.is_used = '1'
AND d.build_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{buildId}, '%')
AND d.build_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{buildName}, '%')
AND d.layer_number LIKE CONCAT('%', #{layerNumber}, '%')
AND d.room_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{roomId}, '%')
AND d.is_mixed = #{isMixed}
AND d.room_type = #{roomType}
AND d.status = #{status}
AND ( d.college_ids = #{collegeIds} OR d.college_ids LIKE CONCAT(#{collegeIds}, ',%') OR d.college_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{collegeIds}) OR d.college_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{collegeIds}, ',%') )
AND t.teacher_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{manageTeacherName}, '%')
ORDER BY d.build_id, d.layer_number, d.room_id

SELECT d.build_id, d.build_name, d.layer_number, d.room_id, d.is_mixed, d.college_ids, d.manage_teacher_id, mt.teacher_name as manage_teacher_name, d.room_type, d.status, s.stu_id as student_id, s.stu_name as student_name, s.sex as student_sex, su.phone as student_phone, c.college_name, s.teacher_id, t.name as teacher_name, sc.phone as teacher_phone FROM room_build_details d INNER JOIN room_build rb ON d.build_id = rb.build_id LEFT JOIN teacher_info mt ON d.manage_teacher_id = mt.teacher_id LEFT JOIN room_info r ON d.build_id = r.build_id AND d.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN student_info s ON r.stu_id = s.stu_id LEFT JOIN student_user su ON s.stu_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN college_info c ON s.college = c.college_name LEFT JOIN teacher_info t ON s.teacher_id = t.teacher_id LEFT JOIN school_user sc ON s.teacher_id = sc.user_id WHERE rb.is_used = '1' AND d.build_id = #{buildId} AND d.room_id = #{roomId}
